urging Mike Pence to run for the presidency is a former deputy counsel to Ronald Reagan and former U.S. Rep. Jim Ryun , R-Kan. Mike Pence said the decision he and his wife will reach will be based on where can we make the most difference for the conservative principles that carried us into public service. It also comes down to where are we needed most. While Mike Pence would be one of numerous Republicans considering presidential campaigns, he would enter a race for governor as the favorite.
